sentences.en: A Boeing 747 jumbo jet airliner lands at a speed of 160 m / s.
sentences.cn: 一架波音747巨型喷气式班机以160米/秒的速度着陆.

sentences.en: A Korean airliner was hijacked by two passengers and forced to fly to Tashkent.
sentences.cn: 一架韩国的大型客机被两名乘客劫持，被迫飞往塔什干。

sentences.en: An airliner came close to disaster while approaching Heathrow Airport.
sentences.cn: 一架大型客机在飞近希思罗机场时差点儿发生空难。

sentences.en: An airliner crashed west of Denver last night.
sentences.cn: 昨夜一架客机在丹佛西边坠毁.

sentences.en: Australian officials had indicated that if nothing was found by that stage, then the search operation for the airliner would not be extended.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚官员曾表示，如果届时仍一无所获，搜索这架客机的行动将不会被延长。

sentences.en: If they arrived early ten minutes, just they catch up with the airliner.
sentences.cn: 他们要是早十分钟到的话, 他们就赶上班机了.

sentences.en: Seven years ago at this hour, a doomed airliner plunged from the sky, split the rock and steel of this building, and changed our world forever.
sentences.cn: 七年前的这一时刻，一架被当作毁灭性武器的航空班机从天而降，撞裂了这座大楼的钢筋水泥，永远改变了这个世界。

sentences.en: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.cn: 大型客机在云层上面飞行.

sentences.en: The airliner got off this morning on its regular flight.
sentences.cn: 今天早上班机按时起飞.

sentences.en: The airliner took off on time.
The airliner was three hours late.
The burntout airliner was completely written off , it could no longer be considered to have any value.
sentences.cn: 烧毁的飞机完全无用了.

sentences.en: The passenger were shepherd across the tarmac to the airliner.
sentences.cn: 旅客们被引领走过柏油碎石跑道上飞机.

sentences.en: The passengers were shepherded across the tarmac to the airliner.
sentences.cn: 旅客们被引导走过跑道去上飞机.

sentences.en: The pilot landed the airliner safely.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员使客机安全着陆.
两架战斗机掠过那架客机.
